block.p: Patricia Elizabeth Lucey, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Richard E. Lucey of Corona del Mar, Calif., was married yesterday to John Sutherland Blackmar, a son of Margaret E. Blackmar and Richard H. Blackmar of Armonk, N.Y. The Rev. Joseph Hart, the vicar general of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rochester, performed the ceremony at St. Patrick's Roman Catholic Church in Bedford, N.Y.

Mrs. Blackmar, 27, is a deputy chief of reporters at Sports Illustrated in New York. She graduated cum laude from Middlebury College. Her father, who retired as the president of the Nynex Credit Company in New York, a sales and leasing finance unit of the telephone company, is the chief financial officer of Edison Capital, an Irvine, Calif., company that finances infrastructure and housing projects. Her mother is a former executive director of the League of Women Voters of Westchester Country.

Patricia Elizabeth Lucey, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Richard E. Lucey of Corona del Mar, Calif., was married yesterday to John Sutherland Blackmar, a son of Margaret E. Blackmar and Richard H. Blackmar of Armonk, N.Y. The Rev. Joseph Hart, the vicar general of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rochester, performed the ceremony at St. Patrick's Roman Catholic Church in Bedford, N.Y.

Mrs. Blackmar, 27, is a deputy chief of reporters at Sports Illustrated in New York. She graduated cum laude from Middlebury College. Her father, who retired as the president of the Nynex Credit Company in New York, a sales and leasing finance unit of the telephone company, is the chief financial officer of Edison Capital, an Irvine, Calif., company that finances infrastructure and housing projects. Her mother is a former executive director of the League of Women Voters of Westchester Country.

Mr. Blackmar, 33, is the photography director at Bishop Books in New York. He graduated from Syracuse University. His mother retired as an executive secretary at the American Can Company in Greenwich, Conn. His father retired as the technical sales representative for the Horan Engraving Company in New York.
